abstract: From a vote on the makeup of the board to stump speeches by frustrated shareholders, the meeting promises to be one of the most fascinating in years.
snippet: From a vote on the makeup of the board to stump speeches by frustrated shareholders, the meeting promises to be one of the most fascinating in years.
lead_paragraph: News Corporation shareholders will have the chance to confront Rupert Murdoch, the company's chairman and chief executive, later Friday. The annual meeting, in Los Angeles, marks the first time investors have had the opportunity to question Mr. Murdoch since a phone-hacking scandal at the British newspaper unit humbled the company over the summer.

headline.main: 5 Things to Watch for at the News Corp. Shareholders Meeting
